summary: A generic base class for representing virtualization facts, intended to be subclassed for specific platforms. It defines placeholders for virtualization type, role, container, and platform, and provides initialization, a getter for the collected virtual facts, and a simple populate helper.
business_intent: To provide a common interface and storage for virtualization-related information (type, role, container) that can be specialized per operating system, allowing applications to retrieve consistent virtualization facts regardless of the underlying platform.
